name: Escape Pluto
description:
This is a flappy bird style game that is being built as a learning platform for others to download and look at how the game was made. It's built for new Unity 3D developers looking to see how a complete game would be built. 

I've found that many tutorials don't teach concepts needed for completing a game. This covers things like how scripts can communicate to each other without hard coding a reference to each other. 

---
